article_title: Voices: Scott Leonard, on the Best Use of Dynasty Trusts
article_text:
Voices is an occasional column that allows wealth managers to address issues of interest to the advisory community. Scott Leonard is the founder of Navigoe LLC in Redondo Beach, Calif.

Dynasty trusts were once a popular way for advisers to ensure that upon a client's death, their assets would still qualify for the estate-tax exemption. Under the old rules, if a deceased spouse didn't have a trust, their portion of the estate...
